title: Approximations Related to Tempered Stable Distributions
authors: Kalyan Burman, Neelesh S Upadhye and Palaniappan Vellaisamy
abstract:
In this article, we first obtain, for the Kolmogorov distance, an error bound
between a tempered stable and a compound Poisson distribution and also an error
bound between a tempered stable and an alpha stable distribution via Stein
method. For the smooth Wasserstein distance, an error bound between two
tempered stable distributions is also derived. As examples, we discuss the
approximation of a tempered stable to normal and variance gamma distributions.
As corollaries, the corresponding limit theorem follows
